metadata.dc:description: Annual mean composite of Sentinel-2 NDVI. Returns a single band RasterCube.
metadata.dc:comment:
Given a year and area of interest, returns an annual mean composite of NDVI. The NDVI is a dimensionless vegetation index, which provides information on the greenness of the surface. It is closely related to the Fraction of Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation (FAPAR), and is little scale-dependent. Even though it is not a physical property of the vegetation cover, its simple formulation makes it widely used for ecosystem monitoring.

NDVI is processed in OpenEO (https://github.com/integratedmodelling/OpenEO-UDP-UDF-catalogue/blob/main/UDP/UDP_annual_avg_ndvi_10m.py). Given a year and an area of interest, the mean composite of NDVI is returned.
metadata.dc:title: Annual mean composite of Sentinel-2 NDVI
metadata.dc:creator:
Isabelle Piccard
Else Swinnen
Liesbeth De Keukelaere
Ruben Van De Kerchove
Herman Eerens
metadata.dc:source: Piccard et al. (2020). Terrascope Sentinel-2 Algorithm Theoretical Base Document S2 – NDVI & BIOPAR – V200. https://docs.terrascope.be/DataProducts/Sentinel-2/references/VITO_S2_ATBD_S2_NDVI_BIOPAR_V200.pdf
